scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:http && npm run build:https && npm run build:nvivn
scripts.build:http: ncc build http.js && terser dist/index.js -o dist/http.js && rm dist/index.js
scripts.build:https: ncc build https.js && terser dist/index.js -o dist/https.js && rm dist/index.js
scripts.build:nvivn: ncc build nvivn.js && terser dist/index.js -o dist/nvivn.js && rm dist/index.js
